entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
